Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager

Class RegistrationManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager.RegistrationManager
public class RegistrationManager extends Object
Class for registration managers which includes users and registrars to set up schedules/catalogs. This class also allows users to 'login' and 'logout' to view their respective abilities/schedules. Only one registration manager may be open at a single time, that manager may clear all of it's data.
Author:
Peyton Herring, Dee Kandel, Diego Sarria and group
